interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2020/12/23
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Franklin J. Schaffner'], 'Producers': ['Arthur P. Jacobs'], 'Starring': ['Charlton Heston', 'Roddy McDowall', 'Kim Hunter'], 'Studio': ['20TH CENTURY FOX']}
Review Text: Prime needs to really rearrange or regulate the video's audio soundtrack of their movies!!- 😟ROARS SO LOUD!!.. 😣😱when the sound affeçts come in, only to barely hear the words when they speak!!..😦 I'm sorry to say, little movies do I listen to in Prime anymore because of this poor regulating of their audio soundtracks. 😲 Always quickly having to lower the sound button so I don't blow my neighbors outa' bed!! 😵😵😵!! No foolin', Jack!! 😮My tenant got blown away😲 n asked me to please turn the sound down and I totally understood how they felt. I explained what was goin' on with this audio soundtrack that all of a sudden it barrels out loud 😵vs. barely hearing anyone in the picture speaking!!😮😶😥 Which,.. I had the sound 'maxed out' on the highest level 😱 just to hear them speaking!! 😠😞Also, you can get very tired😕😩 😴having to keep being a johnny-on-the-spot😇 monitoring the sound!😕 It's all pretty bad- bad-...BAD!!😤 PLEASE, PRIME!! DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS ISSUE AND I'LL NOT BE BUYING SO MUCH FROM TUBI !!!- 😥Other then this,..you have an easy selection on just about all I could find in the way of good, new n older, movies!~😁😀😉
Review Title: Poorly Regulated-Audio Soundtrack!!!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

- **General Preferences:** The user is passionate about classic and vintage cinema, especially films from Hollywood's golden age, alongside family-friendly movies with uplifting storytelling.

- **Genre Interest:** They primarily enjoy comedy and drama but also have a taste for quirky science fiction narratives, musicals, and heartfelt stories.

- **Rating Tendencies:** Recently, the user rated a classic family film highly while critiquing its sound quality, showcasing a consistent concern over audio levels in rental services. Their latest review highlights frustration with significant audio inconsistencies that detract from the viewing experience.

- **Physical Media Format:** The user prefers collecting DVDs, which enhances their nostalgic viewing experience, as they favor physical media over streaming options.

- **Cultural Engagement:** They actively seek diverse and cross-cultural narratives to enrich their cinematic experiences.

- **Actor/Director Recognition:** The user admires classic performers and values artistry in musicals.

- **Technical Preferences:** Technical quality remains a central theme, particularly regarding sound quality. Recent experiences have solidified their dissatisfaction with audio regulations on streaming platforms, leading them to limit use of certain services and consider alternatives. The need for clear audio significantly influences their viewing behavior.

Overall, this profile reflects a user who cherishes classic and uplifting storytelling, while maintaining a critical perspective on technical quality, particularly concerning audio in modern rentals.
